Service Details: - Meets on a regular basis to discuss and review strategic directions of Cystic Fibrosis Canada- Meetings are either held by conference call or on location in Kelowna- Area included in this Chapter ranges from Salmon Arm to Osoyoos, to Princeton, and Trail- Seeks new members with a passion to find a cure
